<!--NOTE: This section is for reference and is not designed to be edited in raw markdown-->

### ğŸ–‹ Author Guidelines

#### Review Comments

<details>
    <summary>**Comments**</summary>

    - ğŸ‘ (`:thumbs_up:`) -> **Nice!**: _The code is well written and well considered_
    - ğŸ” (`:mag:`) -> **Deep-Dive**: _Deep-dive on this code_
    - ğŸ’¬ (`:speech_balloon:`) -> **Comment**: _Free comment on this code_
    - â“ (`:question:`) -> **Question**: _Free comment_

</details>

<details>
    <summary>**Non-Blocking Suggestions** (Suggestions that should may not block an approval)</summary>

    - â˜ï¸ (`:cloud:`) -> **Unclear**:
    - ğŸ’„ (`:lipstick`) -> **Formatting/Convention**
    - ğŸ¤” (`:thinking_face:`) -> **Potential Issue/Improvement**:
    - ğŸ¤ (`:pinching_hand:`) -> **Nitpick**:

    > If one of these issues is severe enough to be a potential blocker, then include the âš ï¸ sign alongside to signal that this may be a blocker.

</details>

<details>
    <summary>**Blocker** (Issues that would block an approval until resolved)</summary>

    - â‰ï¸ (`:interrobang:`) -> **Important Question**: _An important question that needs addressing._
    - âš ï¸ (`:warning:`) -> **Potential Serious Issue**: _A potential issue that needs fixing/addressings._
